org.elasticsearch.common.transport

类 TransportAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.transport.TransportAddress
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Writeable

    public final class TransportAddress
extends java.lang.Object
implements Writeable
    A transport address used for IP socket address (wraps InetSocketAddress).

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.elasticsearch.common.io.stream.Writeable

        Writeable.Reader<V>, Writeable.Writer<V>

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.net.InetAddress META_ADDRESS
      A non-routeable v4 meta transport address that can be used for testing or in scenarios where targets should be marked as non-applicable from a transport perspective.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TransportAddress(java.net.InetAddress address, int port) 
      TransportAddress(java.net.InetSocketAddress address) 
      TransportAddress(StreamInput in)
      Read from a stream.
      TransportAddress(StreamInput in, java.lang.String hostString)
      Read from a stream and use the hostString when creating the InetAddress if the input comes from a version on or prior Version.V_5_0_2 as the hostString was not serialized
